pr_title: KOGITO-1786: Cannot run Kogito Tests using Eclipse

timeline.bodyText: When removing the lifecycle-mapping plugin to ignore errors in Eclipse from the kogito-examples parent module, the maven plugin was trying to unzip the XXX/classes folders and was raising an error because it's a folder, not a zip file. This check fixed the issue as looking at how this file is used, it's expected to be a zip file.
timeline.author: Sgitario

timeline.message: KOGITO-1786: Cannot run Kogito Tests using Eclipse
